title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.6 - Permission for solicitation of funds required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1275.6 - Permission for solicitation of funds required

State Regulations

No person shall solicit funds for any purpose at the air
terminal without permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1275.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
